name: Curve 3Crypto Pool
description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This crypto pool contains USDT, WBTC, and WETH. Please be aware that as crypto pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.

tr.description: Bu jeton, bir Curve likidite havuzunu temsil eder. Sahipler, havuzda işlem yapan kullanıcılardan ücret alır ve ayrıca CRV emisyonları kazanmak için LP'yi Curve'un göstergelerine yatırabilir. Bu kripto havuzu USDT, WBTC ve WETH içerir. Kripto havuzları farklı fiyatlı varlıklardan oluştuğundan, kalıcı kayıplara tabi olduklarını lütfen unutmayın.

vi.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This crypto pool contains USDT, WBTC, and WETH. Please be aware that as crypto pools are composed of differently-priced assets, they are subject to impermanent loss.

zh.description: 此代币是 Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者可以赚取交易费，也可以将代币存入 Curve gauge 以获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 USDT, WBTC, 和 WETH。请注意该池的组成代币价值类型不同，因此存在无常损失的风险。

hi.description: यह टोकन Curve लिक्विडिटी पूल का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है। धारक पूल में व्यापार करने वाले उपयोगकर्ताओं से शुल्क कमाते हैं, और CRV उत्सर्जन अर्जित करने के लिए LP को Curve के गेज में जमा कर सकते हैं। इस क्रिप्टो पूल में USDT, WBTC और WETH शामिल हैं। कृपया ध्यान रखें कि चूंकि क्रिप्टो पूल अलग-अलग मूल्य वाली संपत्तियों से बने होते हैं, इसलिए वे अस्थायी नुकसान के अधीन होते हैं।
